mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_reserve (rno, id, fno, day, time, inwon) VALUES(pre_rno_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{fno}, #{day}, #{time}, #{inwon})
mapper.select: SELECT rno, pr.fno, day, pr.time, inwon, isok, pf.name, pf.poster, pf.address, pf.phone, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday FROM project_reserve pr, project_food_house pf WHERE pr.fno=pf.fno AND id=#{id}
SELECT rno, pr.fno, day, pr.time, inwon, isok, pf.name, pf.poster, pf.address, pf.phone, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday FROM project_reserve pr, project_food_house pf WHERE pr.fno=pf.fno
mapper.update: UPDATE project_reserve SET isok='y' where rno=#{rno}
